events.1799: Parshuram Bhau Patwardhan, an able leader and diplomat of Madhavrao Peshwa kingdom, passed away.
events.1864: Anagrik Dharmapal, religious reformer, was born.
events.1876: Sarat Chandra Chattopadhyay was born in Debanandpur village.
events.1879: E.V. Ramaswami Naicker, prominent leader of Dravid movement and social reformer, was born at Erode in Tamil Nadu.
events.1885: Keshav Sitaram Thakrey, journalist, social reformer and historian, was born.
events.1892: Shri Hanuman Prasad Poddar, social reformer, revolutionary and poet, was born in Shillong.
events.1899: First British troops leave Bombay for South Africa.
events.1924: Popati Ramchand Hiranandani, famous Hindi writer, was born at Hyderabad in Sind.
events.1929: La Fontaine, Air Chief Marshal D A La Fontaine PVSM and AVSM, VM, was born in Madras.
events.1934: Gandhiji announced his decision to retire from politics from October one to engage himself in the development of village industries, Harijan service and education through basic crafts.
events.1937: Sitakant Mahapatra, 1933 Gyanpeeth awardee and famous Orria poet, was born.
events.1938: Dilip Purushottam Chitre, famous Marathi poet, story writer, critic and Sahitya Academy awardee, was born.
events.1948: The Nizam of Hyderabad, in a broadcast, announced ceasefire to his troops and accession into Indian Union, which was settled earlier to the announcement.
events.1950: Govt. grants diplomatic recognition to Israel.
events.1956: Oil and Natural Gas Commission (ONGC ) established.
events.1960: Agreement reached with Pakistan on the distribution of the River Indus and its tributaries.
events.1997: Kalpakkam Mini Reactor (KAMINI), the only U-233 fuelled operating reactor in the world, attains maximum capacity of 30 KW.
events.1998: Rabri Devi, Chief Minister of Bihar, expands the Cabinet, inducting nine ministers, even as the Jharkhand Mukti Morcha (Soren) group formally withdraws support to her ministry.
events.1999: Narayan Desai, Ajoy Kumar Basu and Saraswathi Gora are named for Jamnalal Bajaj awards.
